[MY PREVIOUS ACTION - Turn 126]
Reasoning: **Analyzing card game strategy**

I'm looking at the Green Joker ability, which gives a +1 multiplier per hand played but -1 per discard. Plus, the foil edition gives +50 chips, which is solid! The Duo provides a x2 multiplier for having a pair, and I'm holding onto the gold card (3 of diamonds) since it gives $3 if kept till the end. I also have the Glass Queen (hearts) which offers +10 chips and can double my multiplier. I scored 7800 chips from a pair of kings last time.
**Considering card combinations**

I see that the Glass Queen can double the multiplier if it’s part of the scoring hand, but it must be paired with other queens or in a three of a kind to score. I’m thinking about a potential flush with clubs, since I have Kc, 9c, 7c, and 4c. But wait, a flush in Balatro requires five cards of the same suit! Even though hand sizes can be less than five, to evaluate a flush, I definitely need five cards. With just four played, I can’t complete a flush.
**Exploring hand options with Square Joker**

To make the most of the Square Joker scaling, I need to play four cards. This limits my hand options to pairs, two pairs, and three of a kind. I realize that a straight and full house require five cards, so those aren't applicable here. With four cards, I could potentially form four of a kind. For my current hand, I can make a pair of kings with Kc and Kd. I could also play Kc, Kd, plus maybe 4c and 7c, leaving the gold 3d in hand.
**Assessing scoring and strategy**

High cards won’t score since they’re not part of a pair. Since I’m playing four cards, I can leverage Square scaling, but I can't use the Glass Queen unless I have a pair of queens, which I don't. So, I'll stick to the king pair with two fillers, aiming for around 7000-8000 chips. I need a total of 30,000, and since I currently have 7800, I could reach 30k in four hands if each scores similarly. I’ll need to keep an eye on how the Blue Joker's value decreases as we draw cards; it shrinks by 8 each hand.
**Calculating strategy with Green Joker**

The Green Joker increases the multiplier by +1 for each hand played, which means later hands could score higher. I should play a pair and avoid discarding unless necessary to reach 30k quickly, especially with a boss challenge ahead. # Available Commands
The possible commands in Balatro are all composed of a single word specifying the action, followed by any necessary positional arguments, which are lists of integers.
Note: all position arguments are 1-indexed.

The following commands are available in your current game state.
use_consumable <consumeable_position> <target_card_position1> <target_card_position2> ... <target_card_positionN> - Use a consumeable from the consumeables section. The first position argument is the position within your consumables inventory of the consumable you'd like to use. Subsequent position arguments specify the cards in hand that the consumeable will be used on, if that consumeable requires targets.
sell_consumable <consumeable_position> - Sell a consumeable from the consumeables section.
rearrange_jokers <joker1> <joker2> ... <jokerN> - Rearrange the list of currently owned jokers. Every index in the list of current jokers must be present, i.e. if there are 5 jokers, the indices 1-5 must be present.
sell_joker <joker_position> - Sell a joker from the jokers section.
buy_card <card_position> - Buy a card from the card section. Individual Joker cards are also bought from the card section.
buy_booster <booster_pack_position> - Buy a booster pack from the booster pack section.
buy_voucher <voucher_position> - Buy a voucher from the voucher section.
buy_and_use_consumable <consumable_position> - Buy a consumable type card (Tarot, Planet, Spectral) from the card section and use it immediately. Cannot do this if the consumable requires target hand cards.
round_select - Finish shopping and go to the round select screen.
reroll_shop - Spends the reroll cost to reroll the cards section of the shop.
